title: Remington S9500pp Pearl Pro Ceramic Flat Iron, 1 Inch
description: You can get professional style results in your own home with the Remington Pearl Pro 1 Inch Flat Iron. The Pearl Pro is a professional quality flat iron with real crushed pearls infused into the 1 Inch ceramic plates for a smooth glide that provides even, ionic heat to reduce frizz and prevent fried ends. This flat iron heats up to 400-degrees in a quick 30 seconds to provide you with a quick and easy way to the ultimate salon finish.

title: CoverGirl 300 Flamed Out Mascara, Very Black Blaze, 0.37 Fluid Ounce
Toni&Guy Cleanse Shampoo for Damaged Hair, 8.5 Fluid Ounce
Caress Body Wash, Juicy Escape, 18 Ounce
description: Experience freshness like never before with caress juicy escape, infused with sun-kissed lily and pink grapefruit essence. Sparkling scents surprise your senses while lush, uplifting lather envelops your skin leaving it delicately scented and beautifully fresh.

title: Tresemme 7 Day Keratin Smooth Conditioner, 9 Ounce
Remington Products AS7055 Ultimate Stylist Big and Bouncy
description: The Remington Ultimate Stylist Big & Bouncy Styler delivers sexy, soft curls. Simply move the included self-grip rollers up sectioned strands of hair, turn on the styler with controlled 800-watt airflow, and remove the rollers to get larger-than-life curls. With multiple speed and heat settings,your desired look is just seconds away. Dynamic Design – Sliding heated rollers make for an uncharacteristic design that allows for incredible versatility. Salon-Quality Heat – The Ultimate Stylist Big & Bouncy Styler provides 800 watts of heated airflow. Heated Rollers – This set comes complete with three large rollers and three jumbo rollers.
